tram ratha palakawarayeku wana adolfus harbat fedrik norman apalroth nohoth bart apalroth mahatha wisin ohu snanaya kirima sandaha bhawithayata ganu labu baldiya upayogi karagena sini saha jelatinyoda ganimin palamu warata jeli kata sakas karana ladi.pasuwa eewa ohuge tram rathaya gaman ganna sidni pradeshaye geyin geta gos wikunana ladi.1917 warshayedi apalroth mahatha ohuge nishpadana katayuthu sandaha kuli godanagillak yoda gath athara 1926 di albat fransis lanarts mahatha samanga ekwa pudgalika wyaparayak arambauha.ema awadhiyedi guwanyana nawa athdakimak wu bawinda apalroth mahatha aakashatharanaya pilibanda dadi loliyek wu bawinda,ohuge mema jeli nishpadanaya eroplen jeli namathi sannam namayen nam karana ladi.[4]1934 warshayedi ohu tayigar mothnamathi guwanyanaya yoda ganimin dushkara pradesha sandaha eroplen jeli beda dunneya.eroplen jeli sandaha karana lada athisarthaka welanda pracharana wya

mahinda kithsiri ha homagama disa winisuru pitakotta baddagana padinchi ech.si. sunilwikrama abesinha yana ayawalunya.mema siddhiye paminilikariya wanne anka 90/1 siyarata hotalaya ambaulgama hanwalla padinchi dipika shyamali jayawira namaththiyayi.ambaulgama rajamaha wiharaye wiharadhipathiwana galkande bodhiwansha himi wisin hanwalla polisiyata karana lada paminillakata anuwa homagama disa adhikaranaye wibhaga wana 13774 wishesha darana naduwe thinduwa allas paminilikaruwanta wasi sahagatha wana lesa laba dimata mese laksha 3ka allas mudalak sakakaruwan illu bawata paminille sandahan we.mema naduwa sandaha peni sitimata paminilikariya homagama adhikaranaya ta pamini awasthawedi ehi siti polis kanthawak wisin naduwa dinanna nam salli wiyadam karanna oona yayi pawasamin age jangama durakathana ankaya illa palamu sakakaru wetha laba di athi bawata karunu anawaranaya we.mehi palamu sakakaru wenuwen nithignya sithara mimana mahathmiyada winisuru wenuwen janadhipathi nithignya hemantha warnakulasuriya nithignya ajith pathirana samanga nithignya kandayamak peni sitiyaha.naduwaka paminili karuwakugen rupiyal laksha 3ka allasak laba gath bawa kiyana siddhiyata sambandha yayi kiyana homagama disa winisuruwaraya bandhanagara rohalata athulath kirimata bandhanagara baladharihu piyawara gena atha.mema disa winisuruwaraya eeye (30) adhikaranayata idiripath kirimen pasuwa kolambaa rimand bandhanagara gatha kirimata niyama kalada ohu winisuruwarayaku washayen sitiyadi niyoga laba dimen saha thindu laba dimen bandhanagaragathawu randawiyan rasak bandhanagara thula sitima ohuge jiwitharakshawata tharjanayak bawin ohu bandhanagara rohalata athulath karana lesa bandhanagara komasaris jenaralwaraya upades laba di thibe.eeye (30) adhikaranayata idiripath kala disa winisuruwaraya rimand gatha kirimata niyoga labuwada ohu pawasa aththe thamata konde amaruwak athi bawin rohal gatha wimata awashya bawayi.ohuge ema illima menma bandhanagaraye ohuge aarakshawa sambandhayen athi gatalu matha mese ohu bandhanagara rohal gatha kala bawa bandhanagara usas niladhariyek dinaminata pawasiya..

indri dewatha purwa dishawata (nangenahirata) da wahni (agni) dewatha agni dishawata (ginikonata ) da pithrupathi (yama) dewatha dakshina dishawata (dakunu digata) da 474 sidath sangara wiwaranaya nairsrutha dewatha (nairsrutha dishawata) niritha digata da waruna dewatha waruna dishawata (basnahira digata) da maruth (wayu) dewatha wayu dishawata (wayambaa digata) da eesha (eeshwara) dewatha eeshana dishawata (eesana digata) da adhipa ya yeth.
